summary: SummaryCharlotte Tilbury's Collagen Lip Bath Gloss is a clear lip gloss enriched with skincare ingredients to create fuller-looking lips.
details: DetailsFeaturesGet fresh lips in a flash with this high-shine gloss that helps to put moisture back into the lips for a healthier-looking lip look.Key IngredientsLip plumping mustard sprout extract helps to hydrate and enhance lip volume, defining the contours of your lips and creating a fuller, firmer-looking appearance.Marine Collagen moisturizes and creates a plumping effect by hydrating your lips and giving the appearance of smoothing out lines.Coconut Oil nourishes and softens your lips.Pearlescent Pigments create a milky pink sheen that reflects the light to make lips look fuller and wider.Peppermint extract gives your lips a cool, fresh feeling.Item 2619541How To UseStart by outlining your lips using the Lip Cheat Lip Liners (sold separately). Fill in the whole lips to help the color stay on for longer.Use the heart-shaped applicator to wash the lip gloss over your upper and lower lip.IngredientsPolybutene, Octyldodecanol, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Diisostearyl Malate, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, C18-36 Acid Triglyceride, Aqua/Water/Eau, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Cetearyl Ethylhexanoate, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Propylene Carbonate, Brassica Alba Sprout Extract, Menthol, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tribehenin, Soluble Collagen, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Sorbitan Isostearate, Mica, Tocopherol, Portulaca Pilosa Extract, Sodium Benzoate, Retinyl Palmitate, Lactic Acid, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate, Sucrose Cocoate, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-38, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Red 6 (CI 15850), Iron Oxides (CI 77499, CI 77492).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Start by outlining your lips using the Lip Cheat Lip Liners (sold separately). Fill in the whole lips to help the color stay on for longer.Use the heart-shaped applicator to wash the lip gloss over your upper and lower lip.

reviews.headline: Sheer and beautiful
reviews.comments: This is a very beautiful color. It is sheer though it doesn't have the high glass shine that I was going for. It's still a great purchase.

reviews.headline: Change The Wand
reviews.comments: I love this formula and the color Pillow Talk Fair, which is a fantastic lipstick topper and would be great on its own with a darker liner. The wand shape is useless. It doesn't pick up nearly product, so you have to dip back into the tube multiple times to get even one decent layer.

reviews.headline: was good to try out
reviews.comments: pretty but so painfully average for the price, would totally buy again if it was more affordable. I was hoping for the price that this would change my lip gloss game but the sheen wasn't hitting as good as I thought it may for the price. now im trying to meet the character minimun.

reviews.headline: Perfect
reviews.comments: Used this for an entire year and when I ran out decided to try something else. Big mistake. Have come running back to my beautiful Pillow Talk Collagen Lip Plumper because nothing else compares.

reviews.headline: Love the Peachy Plump
reviews.comments: The formula is great. Lips feel nourished and looks plump. I absolutely hate the wand. It feels like two sticks poking my lips. The wand? The were going for a heart shape but it missed the mark. It's not plush or pillowy at all. The gloss formula is great. The wand is in my top 5 of worst wands. Of course it is pricey and at that price point the wand should be plush.

reviews.headline: I love this
reviews.comments: I got it in the store it's my favorite. I wish it was also in a red

reviews.headline: I love this product. Reason for: it isnt sticky feeling.
reviews.comments: I love this product. The only problem that i have with it is the product is the same color as my lips. but thats not the fault of the product. I should have choose a different color.

reviews.headline: Great gloss hate the applicator tip
reviews.comments: Overall it is a great gloss, and I okan to purchase again. It layers well over lipsticks and lip liners. The applicator is awful, in my opinion. I feel like it doesnt truly get enough product on it to cover your lips without dipping into the tube several times.

reviews.headline: Not for me
reviews.comments: As a first time buyer of Charlotte Tilbury, the collagen lip bath was a bit underwhelming. First the color was not right, not a problem it was still a beautiful shade for someone else... but more importantly I was disappointed in the applicator and the gloss itself. It was too subtle, and did not cover with one application, I had to apply multiple times and still did not get the coverage I was hoping for. I will be returning.

reviews.headline: Even People Who Are Not Acne Prone Should Be Aware!
reviews.comments: This used to be one of my lip go to's. I love the feel of it and it pairs beautifully with my lips! However, I am not acne prone at all I get a pimple or a black head every few months but this lip product created a crime scene on my lips. Not only did I get a MASSIVE pimple right on the bottom corner of my lip but I got a big black head just above ny top lip as well! This has left me devastated and that pimple is stubborn and painful! I think that not only acne prone people should be aware of this product and its comedogenic ingredients but even people who are not acne prone need to be very careful when applying this product.

reviews.headline: Perfect for the "Juicy Lip" Look.
reviews.comments:
I normally hate lip gloss and plumping products, but I am in love with this product. I bought the color "pillow talk" and once it has time to absorb a bit it gives me the perfect "your lips but better" experience. They look juicy, not super shiny or glossy. This is thick when you put it on, but within 10 minutes or so it absorbs a bit and leaves your lips looking just a bit wet and smooth. I have been putting it on before bed as an alternative to my lip balm and I've noticed an improvement in how my lips look overall. I don't know how much gloss people are trying to put on at one time, but I personally don't mind the applicator. I dont need it to hold half the tube of gloss on it. 

This has a refreshing, cooling, minty feel and scent to it. It does make lips juicy, but I wouldn't say it was plumping in a way that it made my lips look larger. I personally don't like tingly plumping glosses that turn my mouth red, only to last an hour and then dry out my lips after. If that's what you are looking for, this isn't it.

reviews.headline: so annoyed.
reviews.comments: I bought this item with points. What a waste!The gloss goes on smooth but is sticky within minutes. My lips actually feel drier after using. "Walk of No Shame" is a gorgeous colorâ€”but this formula is definitely a shame. First time I've been disappointed in a CT product.

reviews.headline: Very good
reviews.comments: Love it, very beautiful

reviews.headline: Walk of No Shame
reviews.comments: I love love love the color, a neutral pink that is very flattering. The gloss is thick and stays on pretty well, with the exception of eating but no surprise there. My biggest beef is the heart shaped applicator. I find it annoying and difficult to use. Like I had to really think about how to get the gloss on without 1) getting outside my lipline  2) getting enough to come off the applicator, or the opposite of a glob coming off in the wrong place. I love the color so much I will keep it; jury is out on if I would purchase it again.

reviews.headline: Really gorgeous
reviews.comments: Stunning to look at. The formula is a bit sticky and weirdly minty, but it stays for a long time and looks gorgeous.

reviews.headline: Irritation, Caused Rash
reviews.comments: I tried this gloss for the first time recently and after a few days of using it, my lips were irritated with a bumpy rash and super dry causing it to be painful.

reviews.headline: Love the gloss, hate the applicator.
reviews.comments: Love the product, hate the applicator! The little heart shaped tip just does not cut it when applying. Should go on smooth with a swipe or 2...this is so small with hardly any gloss that comes out you have to keep putting it in the tube. I'm trying to find a different applicator I can swap with so I don't spend 3 minutes applying a gloss. Probably pretty good for thin lips tho.

reviews.headline: love Love LOVE!
reviews.comments: Great quality product. Perfect shade and feels great on lips.

reviews.headline: Waste
reviews.comments: Don't buy this product, this is a waste  of money. No color taste like mint thats it.

reviews.headline: This product is so underrated!
reviews.comments: I love it so much I bought it 3x! I have pillowtalk (the perfect color), walk of no shame (a beautifull redish color, perfect for fall) and refresh rose (has shimmer). It has a cooling (minty) sensation which feels amazing. It's also not sticky!
